extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width: 5000px} body { margin: 52px auto 0; } #contents06 h3 { letter-spacing: normal; } @media only screen and (max-width: 768px) { #contents06 .right a { font-size: 85%; }}
